original_text: On that day his feet will stand on the Mount of Olives, east of Jerusalem, and the Mount of Olives will be split in two from east to west, forming a great valley, with half of the mountain moving north and half moving south.
korean_text: 그 날에 그의 발이 예루살렘 앞 곧 동쪽 감람 산에 서실 것이요 감람 산은 그 한 가운데가 동서로 갈라져 매우 큰 골짜기가 되어서 산 절반은 북으로, 절반은 남으로 옮기고

sentences.original_text: On that day his feet will stand on the Mount of Olives
sentences.korean_translation: 그날 그의 발이 올리브 산에 서 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the Mount of Olives will be split in two
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 올리브 산이 둘로 갈라질 것이며

sentences.original_text: with half of the mountain moving north
